name: Loulou Time !
description:
A short 2D platformer game done during the Game Off 2020 host by Github.

Dash your way through those short but challenging level ! Every mistake might cost you the game. Die and go back to the precedent level ! 

Try to go as fast as possible or collect all the gold nuggets and secret collectibles hide into the levels !

Music  Credits :

Voxel Revolution by Kevin MacLeod Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/7017-voxel-revolution License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

Bleeping Demo by Kevin MacLeod Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/7012-bleeping-demo License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
